page.title: 07ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content: My dad is a gardener and is also in the territorial army.The garden that he works in belongs to Mrs Harris.Mrs Harris lives in Wedhampton manor which has got two acres of garden inculding the tennis court and swimming pool which my dad looks after all by him self.My dad is also in the territorial army.He drives lorrys and teaches the new soldiers to driver lorrys.My mum is a nures in an old peoples home in Lavington she works at night.The house that we live in does not belong to us it belongs to Mrs Harris.So if my dad did not want to be a gardener we would have to move.
